column1: #Text=Due to the contamination risk generated by the radiotoxicity\rof the neptunium element, all operations of preparation and\rencapsulation have been carried out in shielded gloveboxes\runder inert nitrogen atmosphere following well-established\rsafety procedures.

#Text=Polycrystalline samples of Np2Ni17 were\rprepared by arc melting stoichiometric amounts of high-purity\relemental constituents (99.9 % Np, 99.996 % Ni) on a watercooled\rcopper hearth, under Ar (6N) atmosphere.
#Text=A Zr alloy\rwas used as an oxygen getter.
#Text=The sample was melted several\rtimes and crushed before the last melt, to ensure complete\rhomogeneity of the alloy button.
#Text=The material was wrapped\rin a tantalum foil and annealed under dynamic high vacuum\rat 1423 K for 8 hours and cooled down at 50 K/h to remove a\rsecondary NpNi5 phase.
